summary: Title Says it all this mod adds a Vampire Lord follower.
descriptionHtml:
Garthen was not always a vampire he used to be an adventurer who traveled all over Tamriel until he stumbled upon a coven of vampires he fought them and unfortunately contracted Sanguinare Vampiris which later turn him into a Vampire. Due to the social exclusion of being a Vampire Garthen trekked allover skyrim trying to find more of his own when one day he stumbled upon Castle Volkihar. Lord Harkon saw great potential in him so he bestowed Garthen with the gift of the Vampire Lord. Unfortunately Garthen couldn\'t control himself when in Lord form so he is unable to change back he also didn\'t like Harkon\'s ideas so he left but due to his permanent Form he cannot join the normal civilians of Skyrim but due to extensive research and practise he is able to appear normal to the denizens of Skyrim but not to vampires or people of great power. He has decided to mingle with the inhabitants of Whiterun where he awaits someone worthy of his company.

This mod adds Garthen The Vampire Lord To Whiterun near the shrine of Talos.
Due to this being my 2nd mod Garthen now has the majority of the Vampire Lords spells the spells he has currently are:
Drain Life
Summon Gargoyle

To Do List
Move him to the Ancestral Glade
Enable Garthen to be a Nord Vampire out of combat and transform into the Vampire Lord when in combat (Awaiting a reply from Praveen)


Requries Dawnguard
author: TheEccentricWolf

files.name: Garthen The Vampire Lord
files.changelogHtml: Garthen now has most Vampire Lord Spells and should dual wield spells
